text: Sven Plex Petersson, born 7 August 1926 in Lit, Sweden, dead 25 June 2011 in Liding√∂, Sweden was a Swedish sports journalist. He was active for Sveriges Radio and Sveriges Television. He was employed by Sveriges Radio in 1957. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Swedish journalists
title: Sven Plex Petersson
